name: @devvit/platform-monorepo
description: devplatform's mono repo for various packages
author: @reddit/dev-platform

scripts.build:go: make -C devvit-compute-go build; make -C devvit-gateway-service/ build; make -C services/snooron-worker-devvit build
scripts.clean:nuke: yarn cache clean --all && git clean -dffx -e .idea -e devvit.iml
scripts.clobber: npx --yes turbo run clobber --output-logs=new-only && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.husky:install: which husky > /dev/null && husky install || echo 'husky not installed, skipping'
scripts.lint:all: yarn lint && yarn lint:pkg-json && yarn lint:go
scripts.lint:go: make -C devvit-compute-go lint && make -C devvit-gateway-service lint && make -C services/snooron-worker-devvit lint
scripts.renovate: yarn build || true && yarn build:go && yarn renovate:go
scripts.renovate:go: make -C devvit-compute-go protos; make -C devvit-gateway-service protos; make -C devvit-compute-go fmt; make -C devvit-gateway-service fmt; make -C services/snooron-worker-devvit fmt; cd go-common && go mod tidy
scripts.renovate:tidy: cd go-common; go mod tidy; cd ../devvit-compute-go; go mod tidy; cd ../devvit-gateway-service; go mod tidy; cd ../data-api-service; go mod tidy; cd ../services/snooron-worker-devvit; go mod tidy; cd ../..
scripts.reset: yarn cache clean --all && git clean -dffx && git restore .
scripts.test:all: yarn test:types && yarn lint && yarn test:unit-with-coverage && yarn test:go
scripts.test:go: make -C devvit-compute-go run-go-tests && make -C devvit-gateway-service test && make -C services/snooron-worker-devvit test-unit
